body: Hi everyone, I tend to complicate scripts and find a way connect this geometry to a HB zone for Daylight autonomy analysis, and optimization. Any help will be highly appreciated. Best, N [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zYvUvcLXovBZ4-2jCYkJnRIsn50akiD7-dyoDEEzsVaV8AoSbrFETzKfwdJlzzTVXsxz2grkWtQHXeAFjjngoxpJDh3WUq-2/hbzone.JPG)

replies.body: With the new version of Honeybee it's pretty easy to prepare a geometry like this. Just use addGlazingSrf component and feed connect all glazing surfaces to component. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/aeUsBCPqfVisYxXSvZAhgntnurRkSuDDTO8rmOJvck2mp0MX8FSD0DJVHJk1CkYi4LGtWm8gK4nCiHow1A8AUZ8DrGlQ9zNn/addGlazingToGeometry.png)
